zhān /zhan1/
zhānguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. to observe; to divine
2. to glue; to paste
3. to adhere; to stick to
4. to moisten; to be infected by; to receive benefit or advantage through a contact; to touch
5. to moisten
6. (literary) verbose; (literary) to arrive, to reach
7. felt (fabric)
8. to gaze; to view
9. to drink; to sip; to taste; to lick; whisper; petty
10. felt; silken banner
11. garrulous; to whisper; to joke
12. (literary) to rant; to rave; to be delirious
13. not making progress
14. thick congee
15. (horse)
16. sturgeon (old); Acipenser micadoi
17. sparrow hawk; swift
zhān /zhan1/
zhānle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. to observe; to divine
2. to glue; to paste
3. to adhere; to stick to
4. to moisten; to be infected by; to receive benefit or advantage through a contact; to touch
5. to moisten
6. (literary) verbose; (literary) to arrive, to reach
7. felt (fabric)
8. to gaze; to view
9. to drink; to sip; to taste; to lick; whisper; petty
10. felt; silken banner
11. garrulous; to whisper; to joke
12. (literary) to rant; to rave; to be delirious
13. not making progress
14. thick congee
15. (horse)
16. sturgeon (old); Acipenser micadoi
17. sparrow hawk; swift

■ (coll.) jerk; scumbag (esp. in romantic relationships)

zhāng /zhang1/
1. to open up; to spread; sheet of paper; classifier for flat objects, sheet; classifier for votes
2. chapter; section; clause; movement (of symphony); seal; badge; regulation; order
3. clear; conspicuous; manifest
4. river deer; roebuck
5. husband's father
6. bright; to rise (of sun)
7. camphor; Cinnamonum camphara
8. jade tablet used in ceremonies, shaped like the left or right half of a "gui" »guī«, also given to male infants to play with
9. food; white cooked rice
10. place name
11. octopus
zhāng /zhang1/
zhāngzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to open up; to spread; sheet of paper; classifier for flat objects, sheet; classifier for votes
2. chapter; section; clause; movement (of symphony); seal; badge; regulation; order
3. clear; conspicuous; manifest

8. jade tablet used in ceremonies, shaped like the left or right half of a "gui" »guī«, also given to male infants to play with
9. food; white cooked rice
10. place name
11. octopus
zhāng /zhang1/

4. river deer; roebuck

11. octopus

Zhāng Guótāo /Zhang1 Guo2 tao1/*
■ Zhang Guotao (1897-1979), Chinese communist leader in the 1920s and 1930s, defected to Guomindang in 1938
Zhāng Héng /Zhang1 Heng2/*
■ Zhang Heng (78-139) great Han dynasty astronomer and mathematician
Zhāng Huá /Zhang1 Hua2/*
■ Zhang Hua (232-300), Western Jin writer, poet and politician; Zhang Hua (1958-1982), student held up as a martyr after he died saving an old peasant from a septic tank; other Zhang Hua's too numerous to mention
Zhāng Huìmèi /Zhang1 Hui4 mei4/*

Zhāng Jí /Zhang1 Ji2/*
■ Zhang Ji (767-830), Tang Dynasty poet

Zhāng Jué /Zhang1 Jue2/*

■ Maggie Cheung (1964-), Hong Kong actress
Zhāng Níng /Zhang1 Ning2/*

■ to call out to; to greet; to say hello to; to inform; to take care of; to take care that one does not
zhāohu /zhao1hu5/
zhāohuzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
■ to call out to; to greet; to say hello to; to inform; to take care of; to take care that one does not
zhāohu /zhao1hu5/
zhāohuguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.

zhāohu /zhao1hu5/

4. towering; prominent; very; extremely; (dialect) marvelous; excellent

6. (wood)
7. wine cup
8. to sway in the wind
zhǎn /zhan3/
zhǎnzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to spread out; to open up; to exhibit; to put into effect; to postpone; to prolong; exhibition
2. a small cup; classifier for lamps
3. to behead (as form of capital punishment); to chop
4. towering; prominent; very; extremely; (dialect) marvelous; excellent
5. to sop up; to dab
6. (wood)
7. wine cup
8. to sway in the wind
zhǎn /zhan3/
zhǎnguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.

4. towering; prominent; very; extremely; (dialect) marvelous; excellent
5. to sop up; to dab
6. (wood)
7. wine cup
8. to sway in the wind
zhǎn /zhan3/

1. to burst; to explode
2. to blow up; to bomb
3. (coll.) to fly into a rage
4. (coll.) to scamper off; to scatter
5. to press; to extract (juice)
6. to press; to extract (juice); device for extracting juice, oils etc
7. to cheat; to swindle; to pretend; to feign; to draw sb out; to try to extract information by deceit or bluff
8. at first; suddenly; abruptly; to spread; (of hair) to stand on end; bristling
9. fence; also pr. »shān«
10. to open; to spread
11. name of a river
12. mumps
13. grasshopper
14. press for extracting wine

zhàn /zhan4/
1. station; to stand; to halt; to stop; branch of a company or organization; website
2. to fight; fight; war; battle
3. to take possession of; to occupy; to take up
4. to dip in (ink, sauce etc)
5. a wooden or bamboo pen for sheep or cattle; wood or bamboo trestlework; a warehouse; (computing) stack
6. deep; clear (water)
7. to burst open; to split at the seam
8. (literary) orderly; neat
9. striped wild cat
10. unadorned but elegant dress
11. chariot for sleeping and conveyance

Zhàn Zhōng /Zhan4 Zhong1/*
■ Occupy Central, Hong Kong civil disobedience movement (September 2014 -)
zhào /zhao4/
1. to shine; to illuminate
2. according to; in accordance with; to shine; to illuminate; to reflect; to look at (one's reflection); to take (a photo); photo; as requested; as before
3. to cover; to spread over
4. a cover; a shade; a hood
5. bamboo fish trap
6. bamboo chicken coop
7. (Tw) (coll.) to protect; to have sb's back
8. (Tw) (coll.) awesome; incredible
9. (Tw) (coll.) (often as »zhàodézhù«) to have things under control; to be able to handle it
10. to call together; to summon; to convene; temple or monastery (used in place names in Inner Mongolia)
11. (bound form) omen
12. to foretell
13. million; mega-
14. (Tw) trillion; tera-
15. (old) billion
16. to surpass (old)
17. (literary) to admonish; (bound form) imperial edict
18. loosely woven bamboo ladle
19. chirp
20. sacrifice
21. banner
22. oar (archaic); scull; paddle; to row; a boat
23. at first; devise; originate
24. the start; the origin
25. fish of family Sisoridae (Asiatic catfishes)
26. pheasant
zhào /zhao4/
zhàozhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to shine; to illuminate
2. according to; in accordance with; to shine; to illuminate; to reflect; to look at (one's reflection); to take (a photo); photo; as requested; as before
3. to cover; to spread over
4. a cover; a shade; a hood
5. bamboo fish trap
6. bamboo chicken coop
7. (Tw) (coll.) to protect; to have sb's back
8. (Tw) (coll.) awesome; incredible
9. (Tw) (coll.) (often as »zhàodézhù«) to have things under control; to be able to handle it
10. to call together; to summon; to convene; temple or monastery (used in place names in Inner Mongolia)
11. (bound form) omen
12. to foretell
13. million; mega-
14. (Tw) trillion; tera-
15. (old) billion
16. to surpass (old)
17. (literary) to admonish; (bound form) imperial edict
18. loosely woven bamboo ladle
19. chirp
20. sacrifice
21. banner
22. oar (archaic); scull; paddle; to row; a boat
23. at first; devise; originate
24. the start; the origin
25. fish of family Sisoridae (Asiatic catfishes)
26. pheasant

Zhào /Zhao4/
1. surname Zhao; one of the seven states during the Warring States period (476-220 BC); the Former Zhao »Qián Zhào« (304-329) and Later Zhao »Hòu Zhào« (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
2. name invented for herself by Tang empress Wu Zetian »Wǔ Zétiān«

zhēn /zhen1/
1. really; truly; indeed; real; true; genuine
2. needle; pin; injection; stitch; CL: gēn, zhī
3. to scout; to spy; to detect
4. precious thing; treasure; culinary delicacy; rare; valuable; to value highly
5. to pour; to deliberate
6. chaste
7. frame; classifier for paintings etc; Taiwan pr. »zhèng«
8. anvil
9. (bound form) hazelnut tree (Corylus heterophylla)
10. to arrive; to reach (esp. perfection); utmost; (used in commercials)
11. auspicious; lucky
12. gizzard
13. eaves; space between two pillars
14. (old) privet (genus Ligustrum)
15. (bound form) (old) wooden support placed at the ends of a wall during construction; (fig.) mainstay; pillar; backbone
16. name of a river
17. jungle
18. (literary) a kind of jade; Taiwan pr. »jīn«
19. to distinguish; to evaluate
20. to receive blessings in a sincere spirit
21. to warn; to admonish
22. Physalis alkekengi
23. abundant, luxuriant vegetation
24. (grass); (orchid)
25. treasure
26. chatter mark
27. Hyporhampus sajuri
28. bird name

2. needle; pin; injection; stitch; CL: gēn, zhī
3. to scout; to spy; to detect
4. precious thing; treasure; culinary delicacy; rare; valuable; to value highly
5. to pour; to deliberate
6. chaste
7. frame; classifier for paintings etc; Taiwan pr. »zhèng«
8. anvil
9. (bound form) hazelnut tree (Corylus heterophylla)
10. to arrive; to reach (esp. perfection); utmost; (used in commercials)
11. auspicious; lucky
12. gizzard
13. eaves; space between two pillars
14. (old) privet (genus Ligustrum)
15. (bound form) (old) wooden support placed at the ends of a wall during construction; (fig.) mainstay; pillar; backbone
16. name of a river
17. jungle
18. (literary) a kind of jade; Taiwan pr. »jīn«
19. to distinguish; to evaluate
20. to receive blessings in a sincere spirit
21. to warn; to admonish
22. Physalis alkekengi
23. abundant, luxuriant vegetation
24. (grass); (orchid)
25. treasure
26. chatter mark
27. Hyporhampus sajuri
28. bird name

zhēng /zheng1/
1. first month of the lunar year
2. abdominal tumor; bowel obstruction; (fig.) sticking point
3. to open (one's eyes)
4. to strive for; to vie for; to argue or debate; deficient or lacking (dialect); how or what (literary)
5. journey; trip; expedition; to go on long campaign; to attack
6. to invite; to recruit; to levy (taxes); to draft (troops); phenomenon; symptom; characteristic sign (used as proof); evidence
7. to evaporate; (of cooking) to steam; torch made from hemp stalks or bamboo (old); finely chopped firewood (old)
8. (literary) boiled stew of fish and meat
9. (bound form) startled; terrified; panic-stricken
10. multitudinous; the masses; to present (to sb); to rise; to advance; to progress; archaic variant of »zhēng«
11. bamboo
12. gong used to halt troops
13. clang of metals; small gong

zhé /zhe2/
1. to break; to fracture; to snap; to suffer loss; to bend; to twist; to turn; to change direction; convinced; to convert into (currency); discount; rebate; tenth (in price); classifier for theatrical scenes; to fold; accounts book
2. to fold
3. turning stroke (in Chinese characters), aka »zhé«
4. wise; a sage
5. jellyfish
6. rut; track of a wheel (Taiwan pr. »chè«)
7. (coll.) the direction of traffic
8. a rhyme (of a song, poem etc)
9. (dialect) (usu. after »yǒu« or »méi«) way; idea
10. to hibernate
11. document folded in accordion form; to fold
12. then; at once; always; (archaic) luggage rack on a chariot
13. "blade of grass" component in Chinese characters
14. to revere; to respect
15. bright
16. old term for the right-falling stroke in Chinese characters (e.g. the last stroke of »dà«), now called »nà«; sound made by birds (onom.); (literary) to dismember (form of punishment); to spread
17. to relegate a high official to a minor post in an outlying region (punishment in imperial China); to banish or exile; (of immortals) to banish from Heaven; to censure; to blame
18. to be frightened
19. (fresh-water fish)
zhé /zhe2/
zhézhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.

zhè /zhe4/
1. (pronoun) this; these
2. (bound form) this; the (followed by a noun)
3. (bound form) this; these (followed by a classifier) (in this sense, commonly pr. »zhèi«, esp. in Beijing)
4. sugar cane
5. Chinese ground beetle (Eupolyphaga sinensis)
6. (old) aye aye!
7. a thorny tree; sugarcane; Cudrania triloba; three-bristle cudrania (Cudrania tricuspidata); Chinese mulberry (Cudrania)
8. locust; Chinese ground beetle (Eupolyphaga sinensis)
9. partridge; Francolinus chinensis

zhèn /zhen4/
1. to press down; to calm; to subdue; to suppress; to guard; garrison; small town; to cool or chill (food or drinks)
2. disposition of troops; wave; spate; burst; spell; short period of time; classifier for events or states of short duration
3. to shake; to vibrate; to jolt; to quake; excited; shocked; one of the Eight Trigrams »bāguà«, symbolizing thunder; ☳
4. to shake; to flap; to vibrate; to resonate; to rise up with spirit; to rouse oneself
5. (used by an emperor or king) I; me; we (royal "we")
6. (literary) omen
7. legendary bird whose feathers can be used as poison; poisonous; to poison sb
8. to provide relief; to aid
9. (dialect) drainage ditch between fields (Taiwan pr. »zùn«); used in place names, notably »Shēnzhèn«
10. to hit; to thrust
11. jade weight
12. pupil
13. poisonous; to poison
14. town
zhèn /zhen4/
zhènzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to press down; to calm; to subdue; to suppress; to guard; garrison; small town; to cool or chill (food or drinks)
2. disposition of troops; wave; spate; burst; spell; short period of time; classifier for events or states of short duration
3. to shake; to vibrate; to jolt; to quake; excited; shocked; one of the Eight Trigrams »bāguà«, symbolizing thunder; ☳
4. to shake; to flap; to vibrate; to resonate; to rise up with spirit; to rouse oneself
5. (used by an emperor or king) I; me; we (royal "we")
6. (literary) omen
7. legendary bird whose feathers can be used as poison; poisonous; to poison sb
8. to provide relief; to aid
9. (dialect) drainage ditch between fields (Taiwan pr. »zùn«); used in place names, notably »Shēnzhèn«
10. to hit; to thrust
11. jade weight
12. pupil
13. poisonous; to poison
14. town
zhèn /zhen4/
zhènguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. to press down; to calm; to subdue; to suppress; to guard; garrison; small town; to cool or chill (food or drinks)
2. disposition of troops; wave; spate; burst; spell; short period of time; classifier for events or states of short duration
3. to shake; to vibrate; to jolt; to quake; excited; shocked; one of the Eight Trigrams »bāguà«, symbolizing thunder; ☳
4. to shake; to flap; to vibrate; to resonate; to rise up with spirit; to rouse oneself
5. (used by an emperor or king) I; me; we (royal "we")
6. (literary) omen
7. legendary bird whose feathers can be used as poison; poisonous; to poison sb
8. to provide relief; to aid
9. (dialect) drainage ditch between fields (Taiwan pr. »zùn«); used in place names, notably »Shēnzhèn«
10. to hit; to thrust
11. jade weight
12. pupil
13. poisonous; to poison
14. town
zhèn /zhen4/
zhènle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.

4. to shake; to flap; to vibrate; to resonate; to rise up with spirit; to rouse oneself

zhī /zhi1/
1. grain that has begun to ripen
2. classifier for birds and certain animals, one of a pair, some utensils, vessels etc
3. (possessive particle, literary equivalent of »de«); him; her; it
4. to know; to be aware
5. to support; to sustain; to erect; to raise; branch; division; to draw money; classifier for rods such as pens and guns, for army divisions and for songs or compositions
6. juice
7. fat; rouge (cosmetics); resin
8. to weave
9. branch; classifier for sticks, rods, pencils etc
10. (onom.) creaking or groaning
11. limb
12. Zoysia pungens
13. respectful (ly)
14. goblet
15. prop up
16. gardenia; cape jasmine (Gardenia jasminoides); same as »zhīzi«
17. base of pillar; prop
18. a river in Hebei province
19. wings of birds; legs of animals
20. general term for jay; Garrulus lidthi

zhīzúchánglè /zhi1 zu2 chang2 le4/*

zhī'ēnbùbào /zhi1 en1 bu4 bao4/*
■ ungrateful
zhī-hū-zhě-yě /zhi1-hu1-zhe3-ye3/
■ lit. »zhī«, »hū«, »zhě« and »yě« (four grammatical particles of Classical Chinese) (idiom); fig. archaic expressions
zhí /zhi2/
1. straight; to straighten; fair and reasonable; frank; straightforward; (indicates continuing motion or action); vertical; vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
2. value; (to be) worth; to happen to; to be on duty
3. office; duty
4. to execute (a plan); to grasp
5. to plant
6. brother's son; nephew
7. metatarsus; (literary) sole of the foot; (literary) to tread on
8. to grow; to reproduce
9. soil with large clay content
10. enraged; resentful; to hate; to desist
11. to gather
12. pick up; to select
13. threshold
14. stake; picket
15. sound of reaping
16. early-planted crop
17. to connect; to tie up
18. Physalis angulata
zhí /zhi2/
zhízhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. straight; to straighten; fair and reasonable; frank; straightforward; (indicates continuing motion or action); vertical; vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
2. value; (to be) worth; to happen to; to be on duty
3. office; duty
4. to execute (a plan); to grasp
5. to plant
6. brother's son; nephew
7. metatarsus; (literary) sole of the foot; (literary) to tread on
8. to grow; to reproduce
9. soil with large clay content
10. enraged; resentful; to hate; to desist
11. to gather
12. pick up; to select
13. threshold
14. stake; picket
15. sound of reaping
16. early-planted crop
17. to connect; to tie up
18. Physalis angulata
zhí /zhi2/
zhíguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. straight; to straighten; fair and reasonable; frank; straightforward; (indicates continuing motion or action); vertical; vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
2. value; (to be) worth; to happen to; to be on duty
3. office; duty
4. to execute (a plan); to grasp
5. to plant
6. brother's son; nephew
7. metatarsus; (literary) sole of the foot; (literary) to tread on
8. to grow; to reproduce
9. soil with large clay content
10. enraged; resentful; to hate; to desist
11. to gather
12. pick up; to select
13. threshold
14. stake; picket
15. sound of reaping
16. early-planted crop
17. to connect; to tie up
18. Physalis angulata
zhí /zhi2/
zhíle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. straight; to straighten; fair and reasonable; frank; straightforward; (indicates continuing motion or action); vertical; vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
2. value; (to be) worth; to happen to; to be on duty
3. office; duty
4. to execute (a plan); to grasp
5. to plant
6. brother's son; nephew
7. metatarsus; (literary) sole of the foot; (literary) to tread on
8. to grow; to reproduce
9. soil with large clay content
10. enraged; resentful; to hate; to desist
11. to gather
12. pick up; to select
13. threshold
14. stake; picket
15. sound of reaping
16. early-planted crop
17. to connect; to tie up
18. Physalis angulata
Zhí /Zhi2/
■ surname Zhi; Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors »Yándì« descended from Shennong »Shénnóng« Farmer God

zhǐ /zhi3/
1. only; merely; just
2. finger; to point at or to; to indicate or refer to; to depend on; to count on; (of hair) to stand on end
3. paper; CL: zhāng, dá
4. classifier for documents, letters etc
5. to stop; to prohibit; until; only
6. ester
7. toe

zhǐyǒu /zhi3you3/
1. only have ...; there is only ...
2. (used in combination with »cái«) it is only if ... (that one can ...) (as in »zhǐyǒutōngguòzhìliáocáinéngquányù« "the only way to cure it is with therapy")
3. it is only (someone) who ... (as in »zhǐyǒunánxìngcáiyǒucǐxūyào« "only men would have such a requirement")
4. (used to express lack of alternatives) can only; have no choice but to (as in »zhǐyǒuqūfú« "the only thing you can do is give in")

2. to testify; to give evidence

zhǐ bāobuzhù huǒ /zhi3 bao1bu5zhu4 huo3/

zhì /zhi4/
1. to arrive; most; to; until
2. to rule; to govern; to manage; to control; to harness (a river); to treat (a disease); to wipe out (a pest); to punish; to research
3. system; to control; to regulate
4. to manufacture; to make
5. (bound form) fine; delicate; exquisite
6. (literary) to send; to transmit; to convey
7. (bound form) to cause; to lead to; consequently
8. to install; to place; to put; to buy
9. character; nature; quality; plain; to pawn; pledge; hostage; to question; Taiwan pr. »zhí«
10. (literary) wise; wisdom
11. to record; to write a footnote
12. to toss; to throw dice; Taiwan pr. »zhí«
13. aspiration; ambition; the will
14. sign; mark; to record; to write a footnote
15. birthmark; mole
16. to broil; to roast
17. (bound form) sluggish; stagnant
18. sincere
19. flag
20. piles; hemorrhoid
21. to obstruct; to stop up
22. fluke; leech; hirudinea
23. ringed pheasant
24. (literary) to tower aloft
25. infantile; young
26. fetters
27. (literary) salary according to rank; (literary) an official's rank; (literary) order; orderliness; (literary) decade
28. worm-like invertebrate; mythical animal (see »xièzhì«)
29. to advance; to ascend; to promote
30. to wait for; to lay in
31. river bent
32. to put aside; to put down; to discard
33. book cover
34. to prepare
35. unicorn
36. swine
37. (literary) (bound form) jealous
38. enraged
39. to scratch
40. comb; to comb; to weed out; to eliminate; Taiwan pr. »jié«
41. mad dog
42. ancient sacrifice
43. prostrate
44. to stitch; to mend
45. vagina
46. (classifier) ten years
47. goblet
48. gifts to superiors
49. to squat; to stop
50. to stumble
51. back and lower of chariot; short; low
52. to leap over
53. extremely; very
54. sickle
55. to engrave; to record
56. (executioner's) block
57. a stallion; to rise; to arrange; to stabilize; to differentiate; to judge
58. heavy horse; horse unable to move because of twisted leg; plodding
59. fierce; brutal; bird of prey

zhōu /zhou1/
1. to make a circuit; to circle; circle; circumference; lap; cycle; complete; all; all over; thorough; to help financially
2. week; weekly
3. prefecture; (old) province; (old) administrative division; state (e.g. of US); oblast (Russia); canton (Switzerland)
4. congee; gruel; porridge; CL: wǎn
5. continent; island in a river
6. boat
7. to conceal; to cover
8. twittering of birds
9. syllable
10. (feminine name)
11. name of a district in Shaanxi
12. to make up (a story); Taiwan pr. »zōu«
13. (literary) to curse; to deceive; to lie
14. to give to the needy; to bestow alms; charity
15. (literary) shaft (of a cart); cart
16. divine horse
zhōu /zhou1/
zhōuzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.

Zhōu'èr /Zhou1 er4/*
■ Tuesday
Zhōu Bó /Zhou1 Bo2/*
■ Zhou Bo (?-169 BC), military man and politician at the Qin-Han transition, a founding minister of Western Han
Zhōu Chéngwáng /Zhou1 Cheng2 wang2/*
■ King Cheng of Zhou (1055-1021 BC), reigned 1042-1021 BC as the 2nd king of Western Zhou »Xī Zhōu«, son of King Wu of Zhou »Zhōu Wǔwáng«
Zhōu Chuányīng /Zhou1 Chuan2 ying1/*
■ Zhou Chuanying (1912-1988), Kunqu »Kūnqǔ« opera actor
Zhōu Chǔ /Zhou1 Chu3/*
■ Zhou Chu (236-297), Jin dynasty general
Zhōu Dūnyí /Zhou1 Dun1 yi2/*
■ Zhou Dunyi (1017-1073), Song dynasty neo-Confucian scholar
Zhōu Ēnlái /Zhou1 En1 lai2/*
■ Zhou Enlai (1898-1976), Chinese communist leader, prime minister 1949-1976
Zhōu Huájiàn /Zhou1 Hua2 jian4/*
■ Wakin Chau (1960-), HK-born Taiwanese singer and actor
Zhōu Jiélún /Zhou1 Jie2 lun2/*
■ Jay Chou (1979-), Taiwanese pop star
Zhōu Jì /Zhou1 Ji4/*
■ Zhou Ji (1781-1839), Qing writer and poet
Zhōu Liáng Shūyí /Zhou1 Liang2 Shu1 yi2/*
■ Selina Chow (Chow Liang Shuk-yee) (1945-), Hong Kong politician
Zhōu Lìbō /Zhou1 Li4 bo1/*
■ Zhou Libo (1908-1979), left-wing journalist, translator and novelist; Zhou Libo (1967-), Chinese stand-up comedian
Zhōu Mùwáng /Zhou1 Mu4 wang2/*
■ King Mu, fifth king of Zhou, said to have lived to 105 and reigned 976-922 BC or 1001-947 BC, rich in associated mythology
Zhōu Rùnfā /Zhou1 Run4 fa1/*
■ Chow Yun-Fat (1955-), Hong Kong TV and film star
Zhōu Shòujuān /Zhou1 Shou4 juan1/*
■ Zhou Shoujuan (1895-1968), writer, translator and art collector in Suzhou, a victim of the Cultural Revolution
Zhōu Shùrén /Zhou1 Shu4 ren2/*
■ Zhou Shuren, the real name of author Lu Xun »Lǔ Xùn«
Zhōu Wénwáng /Zhou1 Wen2 wang2/*
■ King Wen of Zhou state (c. 1152-1056 BC), reigned c. 1099-1056 BC as king of Zhou state, leading figure in building the subsequent Western Zhou dynasty, father of King Wu of Zhou »Zhōu Wǔwáng« the first Zhou dynasty king
Zhōu Wǔwáng /Zhou1 Wu3 wang2/*
■ King Wu of Zhou (-1043), personal name Ji Fa , reigned 1046-1043 BC as first king of Western Zhou dynasty 1046-1043 BC
Zhōu Wǔwáng Jī Fā /Zhou1 Wu3 wang2 Ji1 Fa1/*
■ King Wu of Zhou, personal name Ji Fa, reigned 1046-1043 BC as first king of Western Zhou dynasty »Xī Zhōu« 1046-771 BC
Zhōu Xiǎochuān /Zhou1 Xiao3chuan1/
■ Zhou Xiaochuan (1948-), Chinese economist, governor of the People's Bank of China »Zhōngguó Rénmín Yínháng« 2002-2018
Zhōu Xīngchí /Zhou1 Xing1 chi2/*
■ Stephen Chow (1962-), Hong Kong actor, comedian, screenwriter and film director, known for his mo lei tau »wúlítóu« movies
Zhōu Xuānwáng /Zhou1 Xuan1 wang2/*
■ King Xuan, eleventh King of Zhou, reigned (828-782 BC)
Zhōu Xuán /Zhou1 Xuan2/*
■ Zhou Xuan (1918-1957), Chinese singer and film actress
Zhōu Yīyuè /Zhou1 Yi1 yue4/*
■ York Chow or Chow Yat-ngok (1947-), Hong Kong doctor and politician, Secretary for Health, Welfare and Food since 2004
Zhōu Yōuwáng /Zhou1 You1 wang2/*
■ King You of Zhou (795-771 BC), last king of Western Zhou »Xī Zhōu«
Zhōu Yǒngkāng /Zhou1 Yong3 kang1/*
■ Zhou Yongkang (1942-), PRC petroleum engineer and politician
Zhōu Yǒuguāng /Zhou1 You3 guang1/*
■ Zhou Youguang (1906-2017), PRC linguist, considered the father of Hanyu Pinyin »Hànyǔ Pīnyīn«
Zhōu Yú /Zhou1 Yu2/*
■ Zhou Yu (175-210), famous general of the southern Wu kingdom and victor of the battle of Redcliff; in Romance of the Three Kingdoms »Sānguó Yǎnyì«, absolutely no match for Zhuge Liang »Zhūgě Liàng«
Zhōu Yúdǎ Huáng Gài /Zhou1 Yu2 da3 Huang2 Gai4/*
■ fig. with the connivance of both sides; fig. by mutual consent; cf Wu patriot Huang Gai submits to mock beating at the hands of General Zhou Yu to deceive Cao Cao »Cáo Cāo« before the 208 battle of Redcliff »Chìbìzhī Zhàn«
Zhōu Yúmín /Zhou1 Yu2 min2/*
■ Zhou Yumin or Vic Zhou (1981-), Taiwan singer and actor, member of pop group F4
Zhōu Zuòrén /Zhou1 Zuo4 ren2/*
■ Zhou Zuoren (1885-1967), brother of Lu Xun »Lǔ Xùn«, academic in Japanese and Greek studies, briefly imprisoned after the war as Japanese collaborator, persecuted and died of unknown causes during the Cultural Revolution

zhòng /zhong4/
1. to hit (a target); to be struck by (a bullet, illness etc); to win (a prize or lottery)
2. to plant; to grow; to cultivate
3. heavy; serious; to attach importance to
4. (bound form) crowd; multitude
5. (bound form) many; numerous
6. second month of a season; middle; intermediate; second amongst brothers
7. to stand side by side
8. Pekingese
9. vegetation growing thickly
10. (literary) (of a worm or insect) to nibble; to bite; worm-eaten

zhòu /zhou4/
1. incantation; magic spell; curse; malediction; to revile; to put a curse on sb
2. to wrinkle; wrinkled; to crease
3. see »yāzhòuxì«; Taiwan pr. »zhóu«
4. sudden; unexpected; abrupt; suddenly; Taiwan pr. »zòu«
5. daytime
6. eternity; (geology) eon
7. helmet; descendants
8. (old) beautiful; clever
9. (dialect) stubborn
10. beak of bird; peck at
11. to grieve; sorrowful
12. brickwork of well
13. (literary) seal script used throughout the pre-Han period; to recite; to read (aloud)
14. crupper (harness strap running over a horse's hindquarters and under its tail)
15. crepe; wrinkle
16. interpretations of the trigrams
17. (dialect) to wrap with straw; classifier for a bundle (of bowls, dishes etc) tied with straw
18. strong wine

Zhòu /Zhou4/
■ Zhou, pejorative name given posthumously to the last king of the Shang dynasty, King Zhou of Shang »Shāng Zhòu Wáng« (the name refers to a crupper »zhòu«, the piece of horse tack most likely to be soiled by the horse)

zhuānzhùle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. to focus; to concentrate; to give one's full attention
2. monograph; specialized text

zhuǎn /zhuan3/

■ (TCM) to build up one's kidney yang; to boost male sex drive
zhuàngyuán /zhuang4 yuan2/*
■ top scorer in the palace examination (highest rank of the Imperial examination system); see »bǎngyǎn« and »tànhuā«; top scorer in college entrance examination »gāokǎo«; (fig.) the most brilliantly talented person in the field; leading light
zhuàngyǔ /zhuang4 yu3/*
1. magnificent talk; exaggeration
2. adverbial adjunct (adverb or adverbial clause)
Zhuàngyǔ /Zhuang4 yu3/*
■ Zhuang language; language of the Zhuang ethnic group »Zhuàngzú« of Guangxi

zhuī /zhui1/
1. to chase; to pursue; to look into; to investigate; to reminisce; to recall; to court (one's beloved); to binge-watch (a TV drama); retroactively; posthumously
2. cone; awl; to bore
3. (bound form) vertebra
4. (literary) piebald horse
5. short-tailed bird
6. snipe; turtle-dove
zhuī /zhui1/
zhuīzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.

zhuì /zhui4/
1. to fall; to drop; to weigh down
2. (bound form) superfluous; (bound form) (of a man) to move into the household of one's in-laws after marrying; (of the bride's parents) to have the groom join one's household
3. to sew; to stitch together; to combine; to link; to connect; to put words together; to compose; to embellish
4. anxious; worried
5. vase with a small mouth
6. iodide; to weight
7. to let down with a rope
8. swelling of foot
9. circle shrines and make sacrifices

zhuó /zhuo2/

25. to wash; to cleanse of evil

zhū /zhu1/
1. hog; pig; swine; CL: kǒu, tóu
2. all; various
3. bead; pearl; CL: lì, kē
4. vermilion
5. (bound form) cinnabar
6. tree trunk; stump (tree root); a plant; classifier for trees or plants; strain (biology); to involve others (in shady business)

8. to put (a criminal) to death; to punish
9. name of a river
10. twenty-fourth part of a tael (2 or 3 grams)
11. dwarf
12. Quercus glanca
13. Zelkova acuminata
14. pool; pond
15. a toad
16. pace back and forth; to walk
17. name of a feudal state
18. black muzzle (of a horse)

Zhūgě /Zhu1ge3/

Zhūgě Liàng /Zhu1ge3 Liang4/
■ Zhuge Liang (181-234), military leader and prime minister of Shu Han »Shǔ Hàn« during the Three Kingdoms period; the main hero of the fictional Romance of Three Kingdoms »Sānguó Yǎnyì«, where he is portrayed as a sage and military genius; (fig.) a mastermind

zhú /zhu2/
1. various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea
2. (bound form) to pursue; to chase away; individually; one by one
3. bamboo; CL: kē, zhī, gēn
4. Kangxi radical 118
5. candle; (literary) to illuminate
6. chilblain
7. in a hole
8. poopdeck; stern of boat
9. (weed); Phytolacca acinosa
10. caterpillar
zhú /zhu2/
zhúzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea
2. (bound form) to pursue; to chase away; individually; one by one
3. bamboo; CL: kē, zhī, gēn
4. Kangxi radical 118
5. candle; (literary) to illuminate
6. chilblain
7. in a hole
8. poopdeck; stern of boat
9. (weed); Phytolacca acinosa
10. caterpillar
zhú /zhu2/
zhúguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea
2. (bound form) to pursue; to chase away; individually; one by one
3. bamboo; CL: kē, zhī, gēn
4. Kangxi radical 118
5. candle; (literary) to illuminate
6. chilblain
7. in a hole
8. poopdeck; stern of boat
9. (weed); Phytolacca acinosa
10. caterpillar
zhú /zhu2/
zhúle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea
2. (bound form) to pursue; to chase away; individually; one by one
3. bamboo; CL: kē, zhī, gēn
4. Kangxi radical 118
5. candle; (literary) to illuminate
6. chilblain
7. in a hole
8. poopdeck; stern of boat
9. (weed); Phytolacca acinosa
10. caterpillar
Zhú /Zhu2/
■ surname Zhu; abbr. for »Tiānzhú«, India (esp. in Tang or Buddhist context); (archaic) Buddhism
zhúbǎn /zhu2 ban3/*
■ bamboo clapper boards used in folk theater

■ Zhubei, a city in Hsinchu County »Xīnzhú Xiàn«, northwest Taiwan

zhǔ /zhu3/
1. owner; master; host; individual or party concerned; God; Lord; main; to indicate or signify; trump card (in card games)
2. to cook; to boil
3. to join together; to fix one's attention on; to concentrate on
4. to lean on; to prop on
5. to enjoin; to implore; to urge
6. islet; bank
7. to gaze at; to stare at
8. cut
9. ancestral tablet
10. padding (in garment); to store up; pocket; Taiwan pr. »chǔ«
11. wisdom
12. leader of herd; stag

zhǔzi /zhu3 zi5/*
■ Master (term used by servant); Your Majesty; operator (of machine)
zhǔzú /zhu3 zu2/*
■ main group
zhù /zhu4/
1. to live; to dwell; to stay; to reside; to stop; (suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)
2. to pray for; to wish (sb bon voyage, happy birthday etc); person who invokes the spirits during sacrificial ceremonies
3. to inject; to pour into; to concentrate; to pay attention; stake (gambling); classifier for sums of money
4. to register; to annotate; note; comment
5. to help; to assist
6. to halt; to stay; to be stationed (of troops, diplomats etc)
7. to make known; to show; to prove; to write; book; outstanding
8. pillar; CL: gēn
9. five-string lute; Taiwan pr. »zhú«
10. to build; to construct; to ram; to hit; Taiwan pr. »zhú«
11. to cast or found metals
12. termite; to bore (of insects)
13. to store; to save; stockpile; Taiwan pr. »zhǔ«
14. wick of an oil lamp; to burn (incense etc); classifier for lit incense sticks
15. to stand for a long time; to wait; to look forward to; to accumulate
16. (archaic) drum
17. to store; to stand; space between the door and the entrance screen
18. shuttle of a loom
19. percussion instrument, a tapering wooden box struck on the inside with a wooden stick
20. to stand for a long time
21. (literary) chopsticks
22. (literary) cloth made from ramie fiber
23. five-month-old lamb
24. to soar
25. (horse)
zhù /zhu4/
zhùzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to live; to dwell; to stay; to reside; to stop; (suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)
2. to pray for; to wish (sb bon voyage, happy birthday etc); person who invokes the spirits during sacrificial ceremonies
3. to inject; to pour into; to concentrate; to pay attention; stake (gambling); classifier for sums of money

13. to store; to save; stockpile; Taiwan pr. »zhǔ«

15. to stand for a long time; to wait; to look forward to; to accumulate

17. to store; to stand; space between the door and the entrance screen

21. (literary) chopsticks
22. (literary) cloth made from ramie fiber
23. five-month-old lamb
24. to soar
25. (horse)
zhù /zhu4/
zhùguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. to live; to dwell; to stay; to reside; to stop; (suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)
2. to pray for; to wish (sb bon voyage, happy birthday etc); person who invokes the spirits during sacrificial ceremonies
3. to inject; to pour into; to concentrate; to pay attention; stake (gambling); classifier for sums of money

24. to soar
25. (horse)
zhù /zhu4/
zhùle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. to live; to dwell; to stay; to reside; to stop; (suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)
2. to pray for; to wish (sb bon voyage, happy birthday etc); person who invokes the spirits during sacrificial ceremonies
3. to inject; to pour into; to concentrate; to pay attention; stake (gambling); classifier for sums of money
4. to register; to annotate; note; comment

7. to make known; to show; to prove; to write; book; outstanding
8. pillar; CL: gēn
9. five-string lute; Taiwan pr. »zhú«
10. to build; to construct; to ram; to hit; Taiwan pr. »zhú«
11. to cast or found metals
12. termite; to bore (of insects)
13. to store; to save; stockpile; Taiwan pr. »zhǔ«

zi /zi5/
■ noun suffix, as in »yǐzi« "chair"
zī /zi1/
1. (literary) this; (literary) now; (literary) year
2. resources; capital; to provide; to supply; to support; money; expense
3. beauty; disposition; looks; appearance
4. to grow; to nourish; to increase; to cause; juice; taste; (dialect) to spout; to spurt
5. (onom.) chirp; squeak; creak
6. (onom.) sizzle, hiss, slurp etc
7. simplified form of (Note: In practice, is usually used in simplified Chinese rather than , even though is not officially designated as the simplified form of .)
8. mullet
9. now; here; this; time; year
10. (bound form) to consult; to seek advice; to take counsel
11. mustache
12. projecting teeth; to bare one's teeth
13. twins
14. industrious; produce; bear
15. black; name of a river
16. to rain continuously
17. common millet
18. Buddhists; black silk; dark
19. (archaic) field recently opened for cultivation; (literary) to weed
20. number 20 of the 28 constellations , approx. Orion
21. to calculate; to assess; wealth
22. to estimate; to fine (archaic)
23. to falter; unable to move
24. unable to move
25. covered wagon; military supply wagon
26. place name
27. ancient weight; one-eighth of a tael
28. hoe; mattock
29. (archaic) a kind of black fish; bad person (Cantonese slang)
30. tripod with a small opening on top

Zǐ Chǎn /Zi3 Chan3/*
■ Zi Chan (?-522 BC), statesman and philosopher during the Spring and Autumn period
Zǐ Gòng /Zi3 Gong4/*
■ Zi Gong or Duanmu Ci »Duānmù Cì« (520 BC-), disciple of Confucius
Zǐ Guīxiàn /Zi3 Gui1 xian4/*
■ Zigui county in Hubei province
Zǐ Lù /Zi3 Lu4/*
■ Zi Lu (542-480 BC), disciple of Confucius »Kǒngfūzǐ«, also known as Ji Lu »Jì Lù«
Zǐ Shìbù /Zi3 Shi4 bu4/*
■ Murasaki Shikibu (born c. 973), Japanese writer, author of "The Tale of Genji"
zì /zi4/
1. (bound form) self; oneself
2. from; since
3. naturally; as a matter of course
4. letter; symbol; character; word; courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
5. to soak; to be stained; stain; floodwater
6. to abandon restraint; to do as one pleases; comfortable (dialect)
7. (anatomy) corner of the eye; canthus
8. erect; stab
9. to strike; to run against; to throw, as a stone
10. female of domestic animals
11. rotten meat; bones of dead animal
12. cut meat into pieces; diced meat
zì /zi4/
zìzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. (bound form) self; oneself
2. from; since
3. naturally; as a matter of course
4. letter; symbol; character; word; courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
5. to soak; to be stained; stain; floodwater
6. to abandon restraint; to do as one pleases; comfortable (dialect)
7. (anatomy) corner of the eye; canthus
8. erect; stab
9. to strike; to run against; to throw, as a stone
10. female of domestic animals
11. rotten meat; bones of dead animal
12. cut meat into pieces; diced meat
zì /zi4/
zìguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. (bound form) self; oneself
2. from; since
3. naturally; as a matter of course
4. letter; symbol; character; word; courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
5. to soak; to be stained; stain; floodwater
6. to abandon restraint; to do as one pleases; comfortable (dialect)
7. (anatomy) corner of the eye; canthus
8. erect; stab
9. to strike; to run against; to throw, as a stone
10. female of domestic animals
11. rotten meat; bones of dead animal
12. cut meat into pieces; diced meat
zì /zi4/
zìle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. (bound form) self; oneself
2. from; since
3. naturally; as a matter of course
4. letter; symbol; character; word; courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
5. to soak; to be stained; stain; floodwater
6. to abandon restraint; to do as one pleases; comfortable (dialect)
7. (anatomy) corner of the eye; canthus
8. erect; stab
9. to strike; to run against; to throw, as a stone
10. female of domestic animals
11. rotten meat; bones of dead animal
12. cut meat into pieces; diced meat

zìtāoyāobāo /zi4 tao1 yao1 bao1/*
■ to pay out of one's own pocket; to dig into one's pocket
zìtāoyāobāo /zi4 tao1 yao1 bao1/*
zìtāoyāobāozhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
■ to pay out of one's own pocket; to dig into one's pocket
zìtāoyāobāo /zi4 tao1 yao1 bao1/*
zìtāoyāobāoguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
■ to pay out of one's own pocket; to dig into one's pocket
zìtāoyāobāo /zi4 tao1 yao1 bao1/*
zìtāoyāobāole, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
■ to pay out of one's own pocket; to dig into one's pocket
zìtǎoméiqù /zi4 tao3 mei2 qu4/*

zìtǎoméiqù /zi4 tao3 mei2 qu4/*
zìtǎoméiqùle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
■ to invite a snub; to court a rebuff
